summary: Make your own Imitation Moon Sugar and craft your own varieties of Skooma.
descriptionHtml:
Now you too can become a shady dealer of poison. Just take required ingredients to your nearest convenient cooking pot.

Moon Sugar can be very hard to find conveniently. So why not make your own? Skyrim doesn\'t have any plots of Moon Sugar Cane, however, so you\'ll just have to... improvise.

[u][b]Imitation Moon Sugar[/u][/b] 
Grass Pod, Bone Meal, Salt Pile, Elves Ear
Resist Fire, Restore Stamina, Restore Magicka, Regenerate Magicka

Then, you can craft your own varieties of Skooma, using Moon Sugar acquired through other dealers or your own makeshift brand. Though your imitation stuff might be a little less effective than the pure variety, the people will never know the difference. 

[u][b]Skooma[/u][/b] 
Moon Sugar, Nightshade (Restore 25 Stamina)
Imitation Moon Sugar, Nightshade (Restore 20 Stamina)

[u][b]Double-Distilled Skooma[/u][/b] 
Moon Sugar, Nightshade, Skooma (Restore 50 Stamina)
Imitation Moon Sugar, Nightshade, Skooma (Restore 45 Stamina)
(Note: There are 2 additional different recipes for varying degrees of pure or impure crafted substances for this type of Skooma. Impure bottles of Skooma remain named the same, the only visible difference their quality.)

[u][b]High-Grade Skooma[/u][/b] 
Moon Sugar, Powdered Mammoth Tusk, Frost Mirriam (Restore 80 Stamina)
Imitation Moon Sugar, Powdered Mammoth Tusk, Frost Mirriam (Restore 75 Stamina)

And for the desperate addict on a budget, forego using any Moon Sugar at all. 
However, it\'s barely useful for a fix and is more likely to kill you.

[u][b]Leaf Skooma[/u][/b] 
Hanging Moss, Nightshade, Thistle (Restore 10 Stamina, Drain 1 health for 30s)

And an Alternate Optional Download for those who own Dawnguard.

[u][b]Redwater Skooma[/u][/b]
Moon Sugar, Nightshade, Vampire Dust, Red Mountain Flower (Restore 40 Stamina, Slow, Drugged)
Imitation Moon Sugar, Nightshade, Vampire Dust, Red Mountain Flower (Restore 35 Stamina, Slow, Drugged)
(Note: The crafted version is \'safe\' and removes the Quest Script from the effects.)

------
[b][u]V1.1 - Reverse Cook[/b][/u]
Adds the ability to burn down the Skooma to get Moon Sugar back. It will burn off any other materials used in the making of whatever Skooma, however.
This also means you can obtain Pure Moon Sugar by burning off Pure Skooma, if you can find it.
------
I am aware that there are a few other mods similar to this. 
Most of them add extra effects or addiction, this one does not.
I also added in a couple extra Lore-Friendly types (High-Grade and Leaf) as well as the ability to make Fake Moon Sugar. You can also craft Redwater Skooma if you own Dawnguard. Between all that I have seen few others do.
It\'s different enough in my opinion. I wanted something closer to Vanilla that was still fairly convenient and didn\'t rely on any sort of scripting. This accomplishes that simple goal.
author: Cat_Woman1989
